summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3552 for the improvement of West Lander Street (Southwesterly forty-five feet), from East Marginal Way to East Waterway; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43869, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
